text: 1.17 Mat 28.19, Jon 4.2, 1 Ko 2.1, 2.4, 2.13, 2 Pi 1.16 Nɨŋɨd apin. Klays yɨp agyokɨl, binɨb okok kɨlop ñɨg pakñɨnɨmɨn agɨl ma agak. Agyokɨl, kɨlop takaw teplep ak agñɨnɨmɨn agak. Pen agñɨlɨg, bɨ ogɨnap chɨn nep gos tɨpagɨl nopun agɨl apal tek ma apin. Takaw anɨb ak anɨgɨl agen, Klays mab bak alaŋ kumak takaw ak, takaw yokɨp olap tek lek, binɨb okok ma dɨpɨlap tek lup.
